title: Hey Siri Ve Siri
overview: Hey Siri Ve Siri is the uproarious comedy, a clash of cultures ensures when a UK based elite family brings their desi Punjabi servants from India to live with them in Birmingham. The stark contrast between their lifestyles leads to hilarious situations and misunderstandings. As tensions rise and divorce seems imminent, it is up to Sir, the half servant, half partner character, to save the day.
